Beamline API¶

GET /mxcube/api/v0.1/beamline/status¶

Beamline: get beamline generic status (energy, resolution ...) data = {generic_data} return_data = { generic_data, {“moveable1”:position}, ..., {“moveableN”:position} , xxxx }

GET /mxcube/api/v0.1/beamline/(id)/status¶

Beamline: get beamline status of id:”id” data = {generic_data, “Moveable”:id} return_data = {“Moveable”: id, “Status”: status}

PUT /mxcube/api/v0.1/beamline/(id)/move¶

Beamline: move “id” moveable (energy, resolution ...) to the position specified data = {generic_data, “moveable”: id, “position”: pos} return_data={“result”: True/False}

GET /(path: filename)¶

Function used internally to send static files from the static folder to the browser.

New in version 0.5.
